articles.title: European Space Agency Shares Timelapse Video Of Earth From Space To Celebrate New Year 2024 - NDTV
articles.description: In the video, Earth is captured from different angles as the space station makes its trip around it.
articles.content:
Shared 19 hours back, the video has received close to 12,500 likes and 2,85,000 views so far.
The European Space Agency (ESA) shared an incredible video of Earth from space to ring in the New Year 2… [+1978 chars]
